desc:
In the capturing system, I have seen there are cases where the case filing date is in the future.

Please would you make sure the following validation is in place when the capturers input the date:

The case filing date may not be greater than the current date at the time of capture.
Confirm that the current validations do not allow the case filing date year to be lesser than the case year, while allowing the case filing date year to be the same as the case year.
name: CW - CCW232 - Case Filing date
